text:
View this post on Instagram
“IS THAT YOU?” What Lisa K said when I showed her this pic.
A post shared by Courteney Cox (@courteneycoxofficial) on Feb 28, 2019 at 12:58pm PST
title: Monica Shared An Epic Photo With Ross To Celebrate World Siblings Day & We're Having A Meltdown
description: Taking us on a nostalgia trip, Courteney Cox AKA Monica from Friends, shared an epic picture with Ross played by David Schwimmer, and we don’t know whether to laugh or cry! If you are an ardent FRIENDS fan, you would know that back when Game Of Thrones hadn’t made it cool, Monica and Ross were very close to sharing incestuous relationship. I mean, from diaphragms to kisses, they discussed about ev
